main.name: Kharharee Lane
main.description: A very eager and humble developer ready to take on challenging and new tasks daily.
main.bio: I am a Full Stack Software Engineer seeking new career opportunities in Atlanta and remotely. I attended the DigitalCrafts immersive full stack web development program and fell in love with coding. I am now looking for the right company to begin my career with!
main.contactmessage: Hey! I hope you enjoyed my portfolio, please contact me below.

testimonials.text: This guy is amazing, very driven and eager to learn more

That Kharharee must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of bootcasmp and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
